content.description: See pics for start Or create your own. This route can be as hard as the holds you chose , but I based it upon the top edge holds. Foot holds of Smear where your feet feel happy. Work your way from the base corner and top out mantle using the square rock sitting atop this route.
content.location: South side of the river with quick access under the Nickel Bridge, east of the bridge. Park on riverside in front of 2027 Westoverhills Blvd, Richmond VA 23225. Walk to the trail head towards the bridge/woods/buttermilk trail. Make your way down under the bridge, to the river bed. Follow the trail that points you under the bridge and continue, east, under and past the bridge, following the floor that hugs the hill side. You will see a somewhat beaten path and will quickly come upon the short, dug out approach to Crystalis boulder.

content.description: Newly cleaned boulder with one established route. Please feel free to project new routes! More to come in this location
